welcomeDescOne.message: You can now earn tokens for watching privacy focused Brave Ads. Your contribution stays the same.

welcomeDescTwo.message: Earn tokens for watching Ads and pay it forward to your favorite content creators.

welcomeHeaderOne.message: Brave Payments is now Brave Rewards with many upgrades.

welcomeHeaderTwo.message: You are about to start a very Brave way to browse the web.
